title: 2 Bronzeies Looking for a Team to Join in Ranked, something semi permanent.
body:
Me and My brother are looking for a Team to join we are quite committed to league play everyday essentially. would like to join a league team to play better use curse etc. We dont feed and play with quite low death counts, we do play mechanically minded. and can work out plays etc.

my brother mains tyrn, sion top, kha, hec jg, top and jg are what he is wuite good at.

i work with Ahri, TF mid, Braum, Thresh in supp. and kha, ren in jg

add us or get back to us about a team we go well in ranked but are let down when other positions dont work well as a team or lanes just end up feeding.

would like a permanent team to join to work our way up through the ranks :)

cheers

Im : IhakaNZ
brother is : Samssi10
